homepage.title: Groups, services and resources for students
homepage.description: Over 600 Telegram groups, online services and collaborative tools for students of the University of Milan. Join the network, get help and stay updated.

about.title: About us
about.description: Meet the team and the story behind the Studenti UniMi network. An independent and nonpartisan project born to improve communication among students.

services.title: Services for students
services.description: Access online services from the Studenti UniMi network: collaborative tools, useful resources and support for university life.

rules.title: Network rules
rules.description: Read the rules of the Studenti UniMi network: community guidelines, neutrality principles and behavior standards.

search.title: Search groups, degrees and resources: '{query}'
search.description: Search results for '{query}': find Telegram groups, degree programs and student associations at the University of Milan.

degrees.title: {name} | groups and resources
degrees.description: Discover Telegram groups, resources and services for the {name} degree course at the University of Milan.

404.title: Page not found
404.description: The resource you were looking for is not available. Go back to Studenti Unimi homepage.
